name: Quakebringer
Replicating Ring
oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a night counter on Replicating Ring. Then if it has eight or more night counters on it, remove all of them and create eight colorless snow artifact tokens named Replicated Ring with "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

name: Broken Wings
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Fynn climbed the highest peak and waited, still and silent, until the falling snow had hidden him entirely. When the great eagle flew past, the hunter's aim was true."
—*Saga of the Wisdom Seeker*

name: Spirit of the Aldergard
oracle_text:
When Spirit of the Aldergard enters the battlefield, search your library for a snow land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
Spirit of the Aldergard gets +1/+0 for each other snow permanent you control.

name: "Spirit Blade"
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
{1}{W}, Exile Spirit Blade from your graveyard: Return target Aura or Equipment card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Reckless Crew
oracle_text:
Create X 2/1 red Dwarf creature tokens，where X is the number of Vehicles you control plus the number of Equipment you control.
For each of those tokens, You may attach an Equipment you control to it.

name: "Draugr Scourge Lord"
oracle_text: {1}{S}: "Draugr Scourge Lord" gets +1/+0 and gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

name: "Rise of the Marnhorde"
oracle_text:
Create X 2/2 black Zombie Berserker creature tokens, where X is the number of nontoken creatures that died this turn.
Foretell {B} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its fortell cost.)

name: "Search for Glory"
oracle_text: Search your library for a snow permanent card, legendary card, or Saga card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. You gain 1 life for each {S} spent to cast this spell.

name: "Unshared Triumph"
oracle_text:
As "Unshared Triumph" enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.

name: "Skyrim Bear Attack"
oracle_text: Choose target creature you control and target creature you don't control. The creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn if you control three or more snow permanents. Then those creatures fight each other. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

name: "Trolls™️ Official Trailer"
oracle_text:
I — Destroy target land.
II — Return target land card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control.
III — Choose target opponent. If you control more lands than them, create a number of 4/4 green Troll Warrior creature tokens with trample equal to the difference.

name: "The Man Who Passes the Sentence Should Swing the Axe"
oracle_text:
"The Man Who Passes the Sentence Should Swing the Axe" deals 5 damage to target tapped creature.
Foretell {W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its fortell cost.)

name: Tegrid, God of Fear // Tergrid's Lantern

card_faces.name: Tegrid, God of Fear
card_faces.oracle_text:
Menace
Whenever an opponent sacrifices a nontoken permanent or discards a permanent card, you may put that card onto the battlefield under your control from their graveyard.

card_faces.name: Tergrid's Lantern
card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}: Target player loses 3 life unless they sacrifice a nonland permanent or discard a card.
{3}{B}: Untap Tergrid's Lantern.

name: Ravenform
oracle_text:
Exile target artifact or creature. Its controller creates a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying.
Foretell {U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its fortell cost.)

name: The Trickster-God's Heist
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — You may exchange control of two target creatures.
II — You may exchange control of two target nonbasic, noncreature permanents that share a card type.
III — Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

name: Path to the World Tree
oracle_text:
When Path to the World Tree enters the battlefield, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
{2}{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, Sacrifice Path to the World Tree: You gain 2 life and draw two cards. Target opponent loses 2 life. Path to the World Tree deals 2 damage to up to one target creature. You create a 2/2 green Bear creature token.

name: Tyvar Kell
oracle_text:
Elves you control have "{T}: Add {B}."
+1: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target Elf. Untap it. It gains deathtouch until end of turn.
0: Create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
−6: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast an Elf spell, it gains haste until end of turn and you draw two cards."

name: Kolvori, God of Kinship // The Ringheart Crest

card_faces.name: Kolvori, God of Kinship
card_faces.oracle_text:
As long as you control three or more legendary creatures, Kolvori, God of Kinship gets +4/+2 and has vigilance.
{1}{G}, {T}: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a legendary creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card_faces.name: The Ringheart Crest
card_faces.oracle_text:
As The Ringheart Crest enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
{T}: Add {G}. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type or a legendary creature spell.
card_faces.flavor_text: Kolvori's love for her family knows no bounds.

name: Hailstorm Valkyrie
oracle_text:
Flying, trample
{S}{S}: Hailstorm Valkyrie gets +2/+2 until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow source.)
flavor_text: When the path to Starnheim was opened, vengeance rained down upon the enemies of Bretagard.

name: Sculptor of Winter
oracle_text: {T}: Untap target snow land.
flavor_text: "I and my kin remember the old ways. The frost whispers to me in a language too ancient for the Skoti usurpers to comprehend."

name: Cosmos Charger
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
Foretelling cards from your hand costs {1} less and can be done on any player's turn.

name: Village Rites
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: The Skelle raise scorn poles in conquered villages—cursed totems of wood and bone that sap survivors of physical strength and the will to fight back.

name: Koma's Faithful
oracle_text:
Lifelink
When Koma's Faithful dies, each player mills three cards. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)
flavor_text: "Great Serpent, hear my song! We wait, our faith unshaken, for your glorious return."

name: Seize the Spoils
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: "Grab what you want and burn the rest. Leave nothing behind."

oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered.

• Koma, Cosmos Serpent gains indestructible until end of turn.

As Reflections of Littjara enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen type, copy that spell. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

Changeling (This card is every creature type.)

You may cast creature spells of the chosen type from the top of your library.

name: Masked Vandal
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
When Masked Vandal enters the battlefield, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, exile target artifact or enchantment an opponent controls.

Flying

{T}: Add {G}.

{W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice The World Tree: Search your library for any number of God cards, put them into the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

name: Glimpse the Cosmos
oracle_text:
Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
As long as you control a Giant, you may cast Glimpse the Cosmos from your graveyard by paying {U} rather than paying its mana cost. If you cast Glimpse the Cosmos this way and it would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.
